main event: A reported sighting of a large UFO 50 miles SW of Needles, California on May 21, 1954.
interesting points: The report was from a civilian source.
There was only one object observed.
The UFO was sighted at approximately 10-22,222 feet altitude.
Radar sites were alerted, but traffic control channels could not track the object.
The report was investigated by military authorities.
